body_html: conv1.weight is not a Python attribute name. It is the name PyTorch gives to the weight attribute Tensor of the conv1 child module (wrt the the parent module of conv1). So delattr won't work.
body_text: conv1.weight is not a Python attribute name. It is the name PyTorch gives to the weight attribute Tensor of the conv1 child module (wrt the the parent module of conv1). So delattr won't work.
body: `conv1.weight` is not a Python attribute name. It is the name PyTorch gives to the `weight` attribute Tensor of the `conv1` child module (wrt the the parent module of `conv1`). So `delattr` won't work.
